quotes.quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.
God never shuts one door without opening a bigger better door. Hang in there. You are closer to success than you may think.
Hang on! God will be thy strength in any act of your pursuit.
One has to remember that every failure can be a stepping stone to something better.
I know God will not give me anything I can't handle. I just wish that He didn't trust me so much.
We love being mentally strong, but we hate situations that allow us to put our mental strength to good use.

You will encounter many distractions and many temptations to put your goal aside: The security of a job, a wife who wants kids, whatever. But if you hang in there, always following your vision, I have no doubt you will succeed.
When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.
The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
Problems are only opportunities with thorns on them.

One of the most difficult things everyone has to learn is that for your entire life you must keep fighting and adjusting if you hope to survive. No matter who you are or what your position is you must keep fighting for whatever it is you desire to achieve.
Perhaps everything terrible is in its deepest being something helpless that wants help from us.
Never give up. Keep your thoughts and your mind always on the goal.
If you're going through hell, keep going.
In the end, everything will be okay. If it's not okay, it's not yet the end.
Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
We shall draw from the heart of suffering itself the means of inspiration and survival.
Sometimes you will think you can't take it another day. But if you hang in there, one step at a time, you will be able to accomplish more than you ever imagine.
At the very moment when people underestimate you is when you can make a breakthrough.
The longer you hang in there, the greater the chance that something will happen in your favor. No matter how hard it seems, the longer you persist, the more likely your success.
But ne'er the rose without the thorn.

When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
Defeat may serve as well as victory to shake the soul and let the glory out.
The pressure of survival in the big city will make you lose sight of your dream... Hang in there.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
You can do amazing things if you have strong faith, deep desire, and just hang in there.
Consider the postage stamp, my son. It secures success through its ability to stick to one thing till it gets there.
Once you have been through a certain amount of things in life, you definitely grow more comfortable with yourself. To persevere and hang in there and believe in yourself.
Sometimes life gets weird. Hang in there, it gets better.
When one door closes another door opens; but we so often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door, that we do not see the ones which open for us.
I'm not telling you it's going to be easy--I'm telling you it's going to be worth it.
The soul would have no rainbow had the eyes no tears.
We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
Let your strongest muscle be the will.
When you get to the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragement s, and impossibilities: It is this, that in all things distinguishes the strong soul from the weak.
Hang in there. It is astonishing how short a time it can take for very wonderful things to happen.
A bend in the road is not the end of the roadâ€¦Unless you fail to make the turn.
If one dream should fall and break into a thousand pieces, never be afraid to pick one of those pieces up and begin again.
Most of us, swimming against the tides of trouble the world knows nothing about, need only a bit of praise or encouragement - and we will make the goal.
When life knocks you down, try to land on your back. Because if you can look up, you can get up. Let your reason get you back up.
The world is round and the place which may seem like the end may also be only the beginning.
So often in life a new chapter awaits. You ride off into the sunset and discover it's the sunrise.
Hope says every drought comes to an end an regardless of the general consensus there is an expected end.
Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
Be ready to face all the challenges that life may bring, and never lose hope! Be in command of your life. Better your brain by having a better attitude about life.
Let yourself picture everything being better than you've ever dreamed.
Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart . Who looks inside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
Faith is to believe what we do not seem and the reward of this faith is to see what we believe.
Everything and anything is possible when you believe, put forth some action, and focus!
To push forward and show the world that you won't take any more of this nonsense truly defines the person you are and want to be.
Challenges will come your way. But you must not lose faith or get discouraged by the temporary setbacks and roadblocks.
Nothing is this world is impossible to accomplish if you are determined to pursue it. You have within you immense power, strength, and potential.
Difficulties only make you aware of your strengths and bring out the best in you. They have made you who you are and have helped you reach where you are today.
So come what may, never give up and never lose hope. No matter how big the troubles are, they cannot keep you down if your determination to get back on your feet is strong enough.
When the chips are down and you are feeling worn out, give yourself a boost to get yourself back on track.
The difference in winning and losing is most often, not quitting.
I do not think there is any other quality so essential to success of any kind as the quality of perseverance. It overcomes almost everything, even nature.
Continuity gives us roots; change gives us branches, letting us stretch and grow and reach new heights.
Storms make trees take deeper roots.
Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope or confidence.
Success seems to be connected with action. Successful men keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
Just smiling goes a long way toward making you feel better about life. And when you feel better about life, your life is better.
Our greatest glory consists, not in falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
Life would be dull if you got everything you wanted without having to struggle a bit. The key is to turn whatever setback you experienced into something positive.
To every life there are challenges and some happenings, which may come up as one continues the journey of making life worth it and achieving said tasks and goals.
Being mindful of your state gives you the power to prove something against the challenges in your life.
Challenges are less if we hold on to the power to resist the frustrations of our life.
One way or the other, one can also overcome life and its challenges by aspiring to use the power, knowledge and wisdom given them from above.
Those challenges you are battling with in your life have their main sources and you need to deal with them fast whenever they approach you.
One of our greatest challenges is to allow hard, painful, and tear-filled experiences to be our teacher in the classroom of life.
Life is hard and what you do with your difficult life experiences will determine how you turn out in the end.
There will always be problems and challenges as long as we live.
Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you; they are supposed to help you discover who you are and what you are made of.
Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass; it's about learning to dance in the rain.
Facing those challenges can be difficult, as it often requires a great deal of self-reflection and introspection.
Knowledge and experience can play a critical role in identifying obstacles, allowing us to better understand and evaluate the challenges we face at any given time.
Life has a beautiful way of teaching lessons through the challenges you face.
Challenges are part of life and can redefine who you are.
It is wisdom to brazen out challenges and deal with the problem directly to fling down the gauntlet of difficulties.
No matter the challenges you are going through, great people went through and came out of it. You are coming out a success; you are a success.
No matter the intensity of your challenges in this life, increase your curiousty to find a way out of the challenging circumstance.
Always hold your head high, it will provide a sense of pride and will feel better inside.
When life sends us a battlefield, we are blessed to be armed with a shield.
Faith and doubt cannot exist in the same time, for one will dispel the other.
Purpose is the ultimate fuel for our journey through life. When we drive with purpose we don't get tired or bored and our engines don't burn out.
No matter how tired you feel, no matter how much you want to quit, no matter what obstacles is in your way, keep moving toward the vision you have for your future.
Knocked down but not beaten. Tired but not giving up. I saw the sun peek through the clouds. Sometimes all we need is a glimmer of hope.

You don't have to wait to feel positive enough for a smile to happen. You can generate a positive feeling by smiling. Your smile can be the source of your positivity, not the result of it. Smile more today.
Those who do not have worthy struggles in their lives neve enjoy the pleasure of celebrating a hard-won victory.
You need resilience not just for the hard times. You need resilience if you're going to be happy.
